text: Ra Anumzamo'a Israeli vahera tusi arimpa ahenezmanteno, maka hankave zamia eri atre'ne. Ana nehuno ha' vahe'zamimo'zama ha'ma eme huzmante'naku'ma erava'oma nehazageno'ma, tamaga azanu'ma anteso huno'ma zamazama nehizana eritreno zamaza osu'ne. Teve nefa'mo hagna hagna huno maka'za teno eri vagareaza huno, Jekopu nagara zamazeri havizantfa hu'ne.
